headline: TD Cowen Affirms Buy Rating on American Tower (AMT) with $241 PT, Citing Solid Demand
summary: On June 5, TD Cowen analysts maintained a Buy recommendation on American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) with a target price of $241, far surpassing present trading levels. The firm reiterated its confidence in AMT’s growth trajectory, noting robust enterprise demand despite ongoing macroeconomic headwinds. TD Cowen analysts observed that initial talks on tower densification have started, […]
